title: hanta jIva
sahitya:
hanta jIva nAyakan marannO


anupallavi

  cintayil anudinam magnayAyOrennE


caraNam 1    shishira kara kiraNa matu koNDum sUna vishika paritApa-
miha pUNDum shashimukhi vaLarana para vashata sahiya jnyAn
    caraNam 2    kamala samamAya makharuciyum pAram karuNa coriyunna 
madhu mOLiyum kamitAvu tannuDaya guNa kathana mELutO
    caraNam 3    kusuma maya talpamatil vannu kAntan asamashara lIlagaL 
tuDarnnu sa-sukhamAmbuja nAbhan maruvunna tennu
